title: Family coffee and walnut cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '1 heaped teaspoon instant coffee granules', '3 tablespoons hot water', '340g (12 oz) Stork® spread, at room temperature', '340g (12 oz) golden caster sugar', '340g (12 oz) self raising flour, sifted', '110g (4 oz) walnuts, crushed', '6 medium eggs, at room temperature', 'For the buttercream', '1 heaped teaspoon coffee granules', '3 tablespoons hot water', '110g (4 oz) Stork® spread, at room temperature', '340g (12 oz) golden icing sugar', '2 large tablespoons Carnation® caramel', 'walnuts, for decorating']
